title: Meditation: Relaxing Back into Presence (2021-03-31)
itunes:title: Meditation: Relaxing Back into Presence
description: Meditation: Relaxing Back into Presence (2021-03-31) - When we are stressed, our body and mind contract, and energetically we resist the life in the present moment. This meditation helps de-condition the stress reaction by guiding us to relax open from thoughts, relax physical tension, and gently relax back over and over into living presence.
